title: Optimal transport map estimation in general function spaces. (arXiv:2212.03722v2 [math.ST] UPDATED)
abstract: We study the problem of estimating a function $T$ given independent samples from a distribution $P$ and from the pushforward distribution $T_\sharp P$. This setting is motivated by applications in the sciences, where $T$ represents the evolution of a physical system over time, and in machine learning, where, for example, $T$ may represent a transformation learned by a deep neural network trained for a generative modeling task. To ensure identifiability, we assume that $T = \nabla \varphi_0$ is the gradient of a convex function, in which case $T$ is known as an \emph{optimal transport map}. Prior work has studied the estimation of $T$ under the assumption that it lies in a H\"older class, but general theory is lacking. We present a unified methodology for obtaining rates of estimation of optimal transport maps in general function spaces. Our assumptions are significantly weaker than those appearing in the literature: we require only that the source measure $P$ satisfy a Poincar\'e inequ

translated_title: 在一般函数空间中的最优传输映射估计
translated_abstract: 本研究探讨了在给定来自分布P和推前分布T_#P的独立样本的情况下估计函数T的问题。这个设置的动机来自科学应用，其中T表示物理系统随时间演化的过程，以及机器学习中的应用，例如T可能代表为生成建模任务而训练的深度神经网络学到的变换。为了确保可识别性，我们假设T = 𝑛𝑎𝑏𝑙𝑎φ0是一个凸函数的梯度，此时T被称为最优传输映射。先前的研究已经研究了在T属于Hölder类的假设下估计T的问题，但缺乏一般理论。我们提出了一种统一的方法，用于在一般函数空间中获取最优传输映射的估计速率。我们的假设比文献中的假设要弱得多：我们只要求源测度P满足Poincaré不等式。
tldr: 本研究提出了一种在一般函数空间中估计最优传输映射的方法，通过研究给定样本从分布P和推前分布T_#P中估计函数T的问题，并假设T为凸函数的梯度。该方法的假设要求比现有文献中的假设要弱，可以获得最优传输映射的估计速率。
